title: Restore Soft-Deleted Records from Recycle Bin
overview: Restore soft-deleted Cases from Salesforce's Recycle Bin before they are permanently purged (typically within 15 days). Selectively undelete Cases removed during this retention period to preserve important customer support history, related communications, and essential audit information.

config.value: Restore Soft-Deleted Cases from Recycle Bin

Update the SOQL query to filter and preview the source data: SELECT CaseNumber, Status, Priority, Subject, Origin, Type, Reason, SuppliedEmail, TYPEOF Owner WHEN User THEN Name ELSE Name END FROM Case WHERE IsClosed = FALSE AND Status IN ('Pending Customer Response','Pending Internal Review','Awaiting Approval')
SELECT CaseNumber, Status, Priority, Subject, Origin, Type, Reason, SuppliedEmail, TYPEOF Owner WHEN User THEN Name ELSE Name END FROM Case
